name: Personnel Search Services Group
description: Personnel Search Services Group (PSS) is a global executive search and HR solutions group with a leading presence in Asia today. Over the last 39 years, PSS has consistently been among the top executive search firms globally. We have a presence across 6 cities in India (Mumbai, Delhi, Chennai, Hyderabad, Bangalore and Kolkatta), Singapore, Dubai and New York City.
features: Provide service in six different feilds
Headline: Your success is Ours.
ShortDescription: We transform the fortunes of organisations by providing them with the best available Human Resources.
enhanced_description: Personnel Search Services Group (PSS) is a global executive search and HR solutions group with a leading presence in Asia, and offices in 6 cities across India (Mumbai, Delhi, Chennai, Hyderabad, Bangalore, Kolkatta), Singapore, Dubai, and New York City. With over 39 years of experience, PSS has consistently ranked among the top executive search firms globally, aiming to transform organizations by providing them with the best available human resources.
key_use_cases: Expediting the filling of open positions
competitive_advantages: Global presence with offices in India, Singapore, Dubai, and New York City
Over 39 years of experience in executive search
Consistently ranked among top executive search firms globally
roi_benefits: Enhanced organizational performance through strategic HR placements
